name: Tokyo Drive (Prototype)
description:
Full support for controller (Highly recommended)

This is a vehicle simulation game where you are allowed to drive down an endless highway driving your car as you wish 

(Vehicle Audio is functional)

Controls:

Keyboard:

W - Accelerate 

S - Brake

A/D - Switch lanes

M - Manual Transmission 

N - Automatic Transmission

Shift - Clutch

Q - Shift Down

E - Shift Up

Controller:

Right Trigger - Accelerate

Left Trigger - Brake

D pad Up/Down - Switch lanes

Left Bumper - Clutch

Y - Shift Up

X - Shift Down

Known Bugs:

Manual transmission not working

Question:

Do you feel the game is a good in presenting a simulation of a light vehicle as well as being simple to play?
